Covid_19PatientImpactHospitalCapacity

Generated Narrative with Details

id: cdc-covid

url: http://cdcmeasures.example.org/modules/covid19/20200331/numTotBeds

version: 20200401.06

name: Covid_19PatientImpactHospitalCapacity

title: COVID-19 Patient Impact & Hospital Capacity

status: draft

subject: Location (Details )

date: Mar 30, 2020, 5:00:00 PM

publisher: SANER-IG

description: CDC, NHSN COVID-19 Patient Impact & Hospital Capacity Hospital Bed/ICU/Ventilator Capacity. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention’s (CDC’s) National Healthcare Safety Network (NHSN) is supporting the nation’s COVID-19 response by introducing a new COVID-19 Patient Impact and Hospital Capacity Module within NHSN’s Patient Safety Component. https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/acute-care-hospital/covid19/index.html

useContext:

jurisdiction: United States of America (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America', given as 'United States of America'})

type: Structure (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-type code 'structure' = 'Structure', given as 'Structure'})

group

description: Hospital Bed/ICU Capacity

population

code: numTotBeds (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population)

description: ALL HOSPITAL BEDS: Total number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds in your hospital, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow surge or expansion beds used for inpatients or for outpatients (includes ICU beds)

criteria:

population

code: Numbeds (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population)

description: HOSPITAL INPATIENT BEDS: Total number of staffed inpatient beds in your hospital, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow and surge or expansion beds used for inpatients (includes ICU beds)

criteria:

population

code: numBedsOcc (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population)

description: HOSPITAL INPATIENT BED OCCUPANCY: Total number of staffed inpatient beds that are currently occupied

criteria:

population

description: ICU BEDS: Total number of staffed inpatient intensive care unit (ICU) beds

criteria:

population

code: numICUBedsOcc (Details )

description: ICU BED OCCUPANCY: Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are occupied

population

population

code: numVentUse (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population)

description: MECHANICAL VENTILATORS IN USE: Total number of ventilators in use

group

description: Patient Impact

population

code: numC19HospPats (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population)

description: HOSPITALIZED: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient bed who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19

criteria:

population

code: numC19MechVentPats (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population)

description: HOSPITALIZED and VENTILATED: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient bed who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19 and are on a mechanical ventilator

criteria:

population

code: numC19HOPats (Details )

description: HOSPITAL ONSET: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient bed with onset of suspected or confirmed COVID-19 fourteen or more days after hospital admission due to a condition other than COVID-19

criteria:

population

code: numC19OverflowPats (Details )

description: ED/OVERFLOW: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are currently in the Emergency Department (ED) or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed

criteria:

population

code: numC19OFMechVentPats (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population)

description: ED/OVERFLOW and VENTILATED: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who currently are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed and on a mechanical ventilator

criteria:

population

code: numC19Died (Details : {http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-population code 'initial-population' = 'Initial Population)

description: DEATHS: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who died in the hospital, ED or any overflow location on the date for which you are reporting
